name: Christmas Wreath Finger Food
author: volcanomama
summary: These yummy edible Christmas wreaths are made out of cucumbers, red, and green peppers filled with ranch dressing - a cute Christmas appetizer.
ingredients: 1 large cucumber, cut into 3/4-inch thick slices
directions: Distribute cucumber slices on a platter and scrape out seeds from the middle, leaving a deep hole (but don't scrape all the way to the bottom)
Fill hole with ranch dressing and spread a little on the rim, so bell pepper will stick
Distribute green bell pepper around the rim to look like a wreath, leaving one spot empty
Cut out small bow shapes (figure 8s) from the red pepper with a sharp knife and cut two thin strips for the ribbons
